creator: arodionov@sas-by-design.com
text:
Created attachment 29104
Zipped archive with test documents

It is impossible to create text blocks with encreased line height. PDF renderer produces correctly line heights using the same code.

Attached:
document.xml - source code of the test document
document.rtf - document rendered with rtf renderer
document.pdf - document rendered with pdf renderer

Tested with versions 1.0 and 1.1rc1
